dcterms:description: ERA5 is a global atmospheric reanalysis archive containing hourly weather variables such as temperature, geopotential, wind speed, humidity, etc. It serves as the ground truth and source of simulated observations in the experiments.
dcterms:title: ERA5

dcterms:description: The Global Data Assimilation System (GDAS) provides various types of observational data, including multi-source data such as surface land reports, surface marine reports, and satellite-derived wind reports.
dcterms:title: Global Data Assimilation System (GDAS)

dcterms:description: Observing System Simulation Experiments (OSSEs) are used to validate the performance of the proposed methods by simulating observations based on the ERA5 dataset.
dcterms:title: Observing System Simulation Experiments (OSSEs)
